name: Orbit Jam (GameJMunk, PeaceMonster)
description:
This game was made in 48 hours by a team of 2 for the Ludum Dare 51 Game Jam.

NASA is running low on satellites in the sky, and is therefore sending up as many as possible. Your job is to make sure they don’t crash into each other by choosing a lovely orbit.

We will be sending up 1 satellite every 10 seconds, so make sure to aim the cannon correctly.

You aim the cannon with the mouse.

Remember: you can click the satelites to give them a small boost away from earth.

There are issues with the audio in the embedded html version.
Try the JAR or EXE for the  full experience!
